annotations.description: On this episode of How to Drink, I am making the best Cosmo you’ve ever had in honor of “Sex and the City’s” 20th anniversary. The Cosmopolitan is more than ...
annotations.title: Cosmopolitan | How to Drink

textContent:
.25oz Simple syrup
.5oz Lime juice
1oz Cranberry juice
1oz Curacao
2oz Vodka
Dash of Maraschino

Shake and pour
Garnish with lime wheel

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vKv8cnh2ocU
title: Cosmopolitan
